from django.contrib.staticfiles.urls import staticfilesurlpatterns
from app.home import views
urlpatterns = [    path('', views.view_dashboard, name='dashboard'),    path(r'^static/(.*)$', staticfilesurlpatterns)]

from django.shortcuts import render
def view_dashboard(request):    # Code to display dashboard    return render(request, 'home.html', {'data': 'dashboard data'})
